LanguageData.Tatami_Green.label: Tatami (Green)
LanguageData.Tatami_Green.description: It’s made of a straw called "Igusa". Tatami purifies air and adjusts humidity. In addition, its flame retardancy prevents burning if a fire occurs.

LanguageData.RBCeramicTile.label: Ceramic Tile
LanguageData.RBCeramicTile.description: Its smooth surface makes cleanliness easy, though not as effective as sterile tiles.

LanguageData.ZP_Mud.label: Mud

LanguageData.ZP_LandfillSoil.label: Reclaim land
LanguageData.ZP_LandfillSoil.description: (Fertility:50)\nConvert disturbed land back into its former or other productive uses.\nMud, swamps, shallow water, and coastlines can be reclaimed.
